title: Isle Royale National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 13 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Isle Royale National Park Rock Harbor Walk      Time: 1:00 PM to 1:30 PM Location: Rock Harbor, meet at the visitor center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/06/2016 to 08/27/2016 A thirty minute ranger-led walk departing from the Rock Harbor Visitor Center. View Details      Isle Royale National Park Rock Harbor Island Insights      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:15 PM Location: Rock Harbor Auditorium Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/06/2016 to 08/27/2016 Forty-five minute evening program held in the Rock Harbor Auditorium View Details      Isle Royale National Park Sandy Tour from Rock Harbor to Passage Island      Time: 1:30 PM to 6:00 PM Location: Rock Harbor Marina Fees: $38.00/adult, $19.00/child under 12     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly  from 07/11/2016 to 09/09/2016 An 8-mile boat tour on The Sandy crosses one of Isle Royale's popular shipping lanes. The 2-mile round-trip hike leads to Passage Island Lighthouse and explores an area of low moose presence.  View Details      Isle Royale National Park Sandy Tour from Rock Harbor to Edison Fishery and Rock Harbor Lighthouse      Time: 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM Location: Rock Harbor Marina Fees: $38.00/adult, $19.00/child under 12     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly  from 07/12/2016 to 09/08/2016 Visit a historic commercial fishery site, tour with a guide, and take a quarter mile guided walk to the oldest lighthouse (1855) on Isle Royale.  View Details      Isle Royale National Park Sandy Tour from Rock Harbor To Hidden Lake/Lookout Louise      Time: 9:00 AM to 12:30 PM Location: Rock Harbor Marina  Fees: $38.00/adult, $19.00/child under 12     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly  from 07/12/2016 to 09/08/2016 A 4-mile boat trip on The Sandy to Hidden Lake Trailhead followed by a 2-mile round trip hike past Hidden Lake up 320 feet to Lookout Louise.  View Details      Isle Royale National Park Sandy Tour from Rock Harbor to Raspberry Island/Sunset Cruise      Time: 7:30 PM to 11:00 PM Location: Rock Harbor Marina Fees: $38.00/adult, $19.00/child under 12     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly  from 07/12/2016 to 09/09/2016 Take a walk along a boardwalk through the spruce bog on Raspberry Island followed by a cruise on The Sandy around Scoville and Blake Points.  View features like the Canada shoreline and a Lake Superior Sunset.  View Details      Isle Royale National Park Sandy Tour from Rock Harbor to Raspberry Island      Time: 2:30 PM to 5:30 PM Location: Rock Harbor Marina Fees: $41.00/adult, $20.50/child under 12     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 07/13/2016 to 09/07/2016 Take a walk along a boardwalk through the spruce bog on Raspberry Island. Bring a lunch and a beverage and enjoy them in the splendor of wave washed cliffs at Smithwick Channel.  View Details      Isle Royale National Park Forever Wild Centennial Program      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Rock Harbor Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Forever Wild centennial program: Determination. Passion. Understanding. Join a ranger to explore the evolving human values and perspectives that resulted in the protection of Isle Royale as a national park. View Details      Isle Royale National Park Meet the Rangers Evening Program      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Rock Harbor Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Meet the Rangers evening program: The rangers of Rock Harbor will share their experiences about life at Isle Royale.  View Details      Isle Royale National Park Ranger Program featuring 100 years of the National Park Service      Time: 11:30 AM to 2:30 PM Location: Rock Harbor Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Join a ranger to explore a series of interactive tables focused on the past 100 years of the NPS, current issues facing Isle Royale, and hopes, reflections, and support for the next 100 years. View Details      Isle Royale National Park Houghton Library Program: NPS Centennial Program for Adults      Time: 6:30 PM to 7:30 PM Location: Portage Lake District Library  Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 23, 2016 One hour Centennial Program held at the Portage Lake District Library on National Parks for adults featuring highlights on Isle Royale.  View Details      Isle Royale National Park Forever Wild Centennial Program      Time: 1:15 PM to 2:15 PM Location: Windigo Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 26, 2016 Forever Wild centennial program: Determination. Passion. Understanding. Join a ranger to explore the evolving human values and perspectives that resulted in the protection of Isle Royale as a national park. View Details      Isle Royale National Park Ranger Program featuring the history of the National Park Service      Time: 10:30 AM to 1:00 PM Location: Windigo Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 26, 2016 Join a ranger at activity stations that encourage visitors to engage with the history of the NPS.
